sourcesContent:
// src/components/Footer.js
import { Box, Flex, Text, HStack, VStack, Link, Icon } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { FaLinkedin, FaGithub, FaTwitter } from 'react-icons/fa';

const Footer = () => {
  return (
    <Box bg="gray.900" color="gray.200" py="8" borderTop="2px solid" borderColor="orange.500">
      <Flex direction={{ base: 'column', md: 'row' }} justify="space-between" align="center" maxW="1200px" mx="auto" px="5">
        {/* Left Side: Links */}
        <VStack align="flex-start" spacing="4" mb={{ base: '6', md: '0' }}>
          <Text fontSize="lg" fontWeight="bold" color="orange.400">
            Quick Links
          </Text>
          <Link href="#about" _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
            About Me
          </Link>
          <Link href="#skills" _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
            Skills
          </Link>
          <Link href="#projects" _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
            Projects
          </Link>
          <Link href="#contact" _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
            Contact
          </Link>
        </VStack>

        {/* Center: Social Media */}
        <VStack spacing="4">
          <Text fontSize="lg" fontWeight="bold" color="orange.400">
            Connect with Me
          </Text>
          <HStack spacing="6">
            <Link href="https://linkedin.com/in/your-linkedin" isExternal _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
              <Icon as={FaLinkedin} w={6} h={6} />
            </Link>
            <Link href="https://github.com/your-github" isExternal _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
              <Icon as={FaGithub} w={6} h={6} />
            </Link>
            <Link href="https://twitter.com/your-twitter" isExternal _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
              <Icon as={FaTwitter} w={6} h={6} />
            </Link>
          </HStack>
        </VStack>

        {/* Right Side: Legal Information */}
        <VStack align="flex-end" spacing="4">
          <Text fontSize="lg" fontWeight="bold" color="orange.400">
            Legal
          </Text>
          <Text fontSize="sm">Â© {new Date().getFullYear()} Kenneth's Portfolio</Text>
          <Text fontSize="sm">All Rights Reserved</Text>
        </VStack>
      </Flex>

      {/* Bottom Line */}
      <Text mt="8" textAlign="center" fontSize="sm" color="gray.500">
        Designed & Built by Kenneth
      </Text>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Footer;
